statements: UPDATE sales_data SET revenue = 1500.00 WHERE sale_id = 12345;
UPDATE sales_data SET product_name = 'New Product' WHERE sale_id = 54321;
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = 10 WHERE sale_id = 98765;
UPDATE sales_data SET revenue = revenue * 1.1 WHERE sale_date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE sales_data SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
UPDATE sales_data SET revenue = revenue * 1.05, quantity = quantity + 2 WHERE product_name = 'Product XYZ' AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
UPDATE hotels SET revenue = revenue + 1000 WHERE hotel_id = 1;
UPDATE bookings SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE booking_id = 101;
UPDATE hotels SET city = 'New City' WHERE hotel_id = 2;
UPDATE hotels SET revenue = revenue + 5000 WHERE city = 'Paris';
UPDATE bookings SET total_amount = total_amount * 1.1 WHERE check_in_date < '2023-01-01';
UPDATE hotels SET revenue = revenue - 2000 WHERE country = 'Spain';

UPDATE revenue_data SET revenue_amount = 5000.00 WHERE revenue_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE sales_data SET sale_amount = sale_amount * 1.1 WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
UPDATE revenue_data SET revenue_amount = revenue_amount * 1.05 WHERE revenue_date <= '2022-08-31';
UPDATE trends_data SET trend_description = CONCAT(trend_description, ' - Updated') WHERE trend_date >= '2022-06-01';

UPDATE products SET price = price * 1.1 WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10);
